cause.description:
The ASAA is a non-profit organization dedicated to reducing injury, disability, and death from sleep apnea and to enhancing the well-being of those affected by this common disorder.
1. Sleep Apnea, if left untreated, can lead to heart attack and stroke.
2. Many people who are sleepy during the day may have sleep apnea and not know it.
3. Effective treatments exist to reduce or eliminate sleep apnea.
cause.mission: Promoting Awareness of the Dangers of Sleep Apnea
cause.name: American Sleep Apnea Association
